Name: Flames of Fury
Story Background: In the midst of battle, the fiery mages of the mountains call upon the ancient power of the volcano to unleash devastating flames upon their enemies.
Ability: Flames of Fury deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If you control a Mountain, Flames of Fury deals 1 additional damage.
Appearance Description: The card art shows a volcanic eruption spewing forth molten lava, engulfing everything in its path in fiery wrath.
